DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study develop validate blood-based diagnostic test predict prostate biopsy outcome positive negative prostate cancer . Such test serve reduce number unnecessary prostate biopsy .
DOC.brief_title: PRostate Cancer Individual Signature Evaluation Trial Patients Undergoing Scheduled Prostate Biopsy
DOC.criteria: . 1 . Male age 40 . 2 . Patient schedule prostate biopsy one follow reason : PSA > 2.5 ng/ml Rising PSA ( > 0.5 ng/ml/yr ) Lower PSA value risk factor prostate cancer ( e.g . ; family history ) Abnormal DRE Percent free PSA < 15 % 3 . No prior history prostate cancer prostate biopsy . Unable unwilling provide inform consent
